sage.networking.server

Class AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.networking.AbstractGameConnection
      • sage.networking.server.AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type used to identify each client (such as UUID)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameConnection, IGameConnectionServer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameConnectionServer

    public abstract class AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>
extends AbstractGameConnection
implements IGameConnectionServer
    Abstract class to define the protected methods necessary for a game connection server.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz
